translations: n．行话，术语：特定行业、领域或群体中使用的专业词汇，通常对外行人来说难以理解。
· The report is full of technical jargons.
这份报告充满了技术行话。

phrs.translation: 所提供的回馈过于专业

sentences.sentence: People are not having to learn computer jargons, but the experts are having to translate computer mysteries into easily understood terms; the computers are becoming "people-literate”.
sentences.translation: 人们不必学习计算机术语，但专家们必须将计算机的奥秘转化为容易理解的术语；电脑正变得“像人一样识字”。

sentences.sentence: Doctors, actors and sailors have jargons.
sentences.translation: 医生、演员和水手都有自己的行话。

sentences.sentence: So same ideas, just different jargons, slightly different implementations.
sentences.translation: 所以同一个思想，不同的术语，实现稍微有点不同。
